description: Residents will no longer be able to leave isolation early due to rising Covid-19 cases in the UK.
title: Isle of Man removes seven-day isolation option
title_page: Isle of Man removes seven-day isolation option - BBC News
maintext: Following the arrest of two groups of key workers, five of whom were jailed, in the last two weeks, changes have been made to how government restrictions are communicated, Mr Quayle said.
